text.section: The Secretary shall review the strategic plans and the State comprehensive plan and may recommend appropriate changes to agency budgets.

section.section: There is a StateStat process that is managed by the Executive Branch.

text.section: The Governor may require an agency to participate in the StateStat process to help facilitate and accelerate the achievement of managing for results goals and objectives.

section.section: Each agency that participates in the StateStat process shall submit a strategic plan and performance measurement report to the Secretary as part of its annual budget submission.
The report submitted by each agency that participates in the StateStat process shall contain the information required in § 3-1002(c) of this subtitle.
